sentence.Network_en: It was the embodiment of princely magnificence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这体现了和亲王相称的富丽堂皇。

sentence.Network_en: He is the embodiment of the young successful businessman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是成功青年企业家的典型。

sentence.Network_en: A former company executive describes him as the embodiment of Nike's image.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司前行政主管形容乔丹是耐克形象的化身.

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is the embodiment of a quality or idea, you mean that that is their most noticeable characteristic or the basis of all they do.

example.ex: A baby is the embodiment of vulnerability.

means.word_mean: 1. a new personification of a familiar idea;
2. a concrete representation of an otherwise nebulous concept;

sentences.sentence: "a circle was the embodiment of his concept of life"

means.word_mean: 3. giving concrete form to an abstract concept

auth_sentence.content: Is cool the embodiment of the latest fashionable fad?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is cool the embodiment of the latest fashionable fad?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is cool the embodiment of the latest fashionable fad?

auth_sentence.res_content: Philip Gould was the living embodiment of social generosity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Philip Gould was the living embodiment of social generosity.

auth_sentence.content: I thought the professors were the embodiment of wisdom.
auth_sentence.res_content: I thought the professors were the embodiment of wisdom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I thought the professors were the embodiment of wisdom.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]

sentences.en: Employment is the direct embodiment of the citizens’ right to work.
sentences.cn: 就业是公民享有劳动权的直接体现。

sentences.en: The new factory is the embodiment of the very latest ideas.
sentences.cn: 这座新工厂是那些最新设想的体现。

sentences.en: A former company executive describes him as the embodiment of Nike’s image.
sentences.cn: 公司前行政主管形容乔丹是耐克形象的化身。
